headline: The WASH Foundation and Sands Announce 2025 Drop by Drop Project Grant Recipients
summary: NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / October 8, 2025 /Published by Las Vegas Sands on October 7, 2025 The WASH Foundation, a global leader in water, sanitation, hygiene, and education, and Sands have announced 2025 Drop by Drop Project grant recipients: ...
